Hello! We are a full-service dev team in London, UK, and able to work remotely or in-house.

Services

We are a team of two developers, with expertise in:

  • Development of scalable APIs.
  • Full-stack website development.
  • PHP, Symfony, NodeJS and Scala on the backend.
  • Javascript, AngularJS, React and ES6 on the frontend.
  • Dev-ops with Puppet and Linux.
  • Utility creation in Scala, PHP and Node.
  • Automated testing and TDD in PHP, Javascript and Scala.
  • Generating useful statistics and information using SQL databases, NoSQL databases like MongoDB, and various tools.

We work with top clients across London, Buckinghamshire, and in remote teams, to deliver high-quality code and products, using a tech stack either of their choosing or a tech stack recommended by us.

Portfolio

We have worked with global clients like Google, Intuit, Bray Leino and TD, and dozens of smaller clients like City Pantry, Goodwood, Russell Hobbs, and Funding Circle, developing everything from massively scalable APIs, to scalable and automated Linux infrastructures, to mobile apps, to internal dashboards full of useful data.

As well as developing for clients, our developers love open source, and have made contributions to a huge range of projects, including AngularJS, Angular Charts, Nunjucks, and Node Webshot. They have developed many Symfony bundles, and created a TDD tool for MongoDB migrations, Mongrate.

For a more complete list of clients, projects, products and open source work, see the individual websites and GitHub pages of our developers, linked to at the bottom of this page.
